definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The young farmer smiled a springtime smile.
sentences.chinese: 那年轻的农夫满面春风地笑了。

sentences.english: Easily meet your opposite sex, so enjoy your courtship.
sentences.chinese: 身边不断会有异性出现，满面春风，与异性十分投契。

sentences.english: She arrived bright and early for the appointment.
sentences.chinese: 她满面春风早早地赴约来了。

sentences.english: Your presentation must have gone well. You look like the cat that swallowed the canary .
sentences.chinese: 你的发言反响一定不错，你看起来满面春风的。

sentences.english: Her face blazed with enthusiasm and happiness.
Eric just breezed in, full of the good news .
sentences.chinese: 埃里克满面春风地进来，带来的全是好消息。

sentences.english: Stem, the leadership face wreathed in smilesly carry wine cup to arrive next toast go to.
sentences.chinese: 干罢，领导满面春风地端着酒杯到下一桌敬酒去了。

sentences.english: I am looking for a skirt to go with this sweater.
sentences.chinese: 你今天看上去满面春风，什么事让你高兴起来了。

sentences.english: His face was lighted (lit) up with excitement.
The student was all smiles when he got the highest score on the test.
sentences.chinese: 那个学生在考试中得到最高分，显得满面春风的。

definition: smiling wholeheartedly (idiom); beaming from ear to ear
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor
face light up with delight (idiom); to beam with joy
brows raised in delight, eyes laughing (idiom); beaming with joy/all smiles
in glowing spirits (idiom); bursting with life/radiating health and vigor
happy and excited (idiom)/in high spirits/in great delight
